ygData.subject: RE: Drums of Selo's March
ygData.msgSnippet: Drum of Selo s March is a Nagafen drop.  Basically, only a handful of Bards will ever own this fine piece of equipment.  I ve heard it s similar to the
ygData.messageBody:
Drum of Selo's March is a Nagafen drop. Basically, only a handful of Bards
will ever own this fine piece of equipment. I've heard it's similar to the
Mistmoore Battledrum, in the fact that it increases the potency of
percussion based songs. It's more powerful than the MM battledrum though.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)

Subject: [eqbards] Drums of Selo's March
